projects.title: Car Rental System
projects.description: A web application for booking and managing rental cars with secure authentication and real-time availability.

projects.title: Airline Reservation System
projects.description: An airline ticket booking system with user authentication, ticket management, and payment integration.

projects.title: Healthcare All-in-One Solution
projects.description: An integrated healthcare platform providing online appointments, medical records management, and more.

projects.title: Todo List App
projects.description: A simple todo list application built using the MERN stack, allowing users to create, read, update, and delete tasks.

projects.title: Education Portal
projects.description: A portal for managing student records, courses, and online learning resources for educational institutions.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: A real-time weather forecasting app using external APIs for current, hourly, and weekly forecasts.
